hopobject.name: Beagle goes UHVO
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; fi; rv:1.9.2.17) Gecko/20110420 Firefox/3.6.17
hopobject.body:
Using Beagle C4 to capture sky events on remote location with battery and solar power.
Using program Linux UHVO (https://sites.google.com/site/linuxuhvo/) to get stacked images at night.
Timelapse and video recording with uvccapture and ffmpeg.
SSH remote control when needed and automatic image uploads via 3G modem. SMS message control etc..
All set now and Beagle camera is operating really nice! Distance to camera is about 550Km.
